name: Oxygen Inc.
description:
Oxygen Inc has just been founded...by you! Get to work pulling yourself up by your bootstraps by manually pump oxygen to sell, before automating the process with hiring other people to pump oxygen for you, or a bizarre variety of living flora that will automatically produce oxygen for you. Forge your oxygen empire. 

Make oxygen, get money...

How to play:
Click the "Manual Oxygen Pump" button to get oxygen, and the "Sell Oxygen" button to sell it. Use your funds to buy various other means of making oxygen to sell.

Made for the Games for Forests gamejam
